enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
section_title: COMPILATION AND SYNTHESIS OF SUPPLEMENTARY INFORMATION IN FOURTH NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS UNDER PROTOCOL ARTICLE 7.2:
sentences: This issue (FCCC/SBI/2007/INF.7) was considered by SBI plenary on 5 December and in a contact group and informal consultations co-chaired by Sushma Gera (Canada) and Hongwei Yang (China).
SBI adopted conclusions on 10 December, with the COP/MOP adopting a decision on 14 December.
